Description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper. Served with al dente spaghetti.
An assortment of fresh sushi including nigiri, maki rolls, and sashimi. Served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
Tender chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, then grilled and served in a rich, creamy tomato-based sauce. Accompanied by basmati rice and naan bread.
Crispy battered fish served with golden fries. Accompanied by tartar sauce and mushy peas.
Juicy beef patty served on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, onion, and your choice of toppings. Served with fries.
A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.
Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts, tossed in a sweet and tangy tamarind sauce. Garnished with lime and cilantro.
A buttery and flaky pastry made with layers of dough. Perfect for breakfast or as a snack.
Corn tortillas filled with marinated pork, pineapple, onions, and cilantro. Served with salsa verde and lime wedges.
